sentences.en: Adapt the World Hemophilia Day theme to further your own needs.
sentences.cn: 调整世界血友病日的主题以发展你们自己的需求.

sentences.en: Are Chronic Hepatitis C viral Infections More Benign in Patients With Hemophilia?
sentences.cn: 丙肝病毒在血友病患者身上表现更温和?

sentences.en: As genetic blood disorders, hemophilia and porphyria had serious effects on the crowned heads of Europe.
sentences.cn: 血友病和卟啉病这两种遗传性血液病, 在欧洲的皇室内产生了严重的影响.

sentences.en: CONCLUSION: HCV infections in hemophiliacs may be less severe than in HCV infected patients without hemophilia.
sentences.cn: 结论: 在血友病患者中的HCV感染相对于无血友病患者中的HCV感染程度较轻.

sentences.en: Hemophilia is caused by a hereditary lack of one of the clotting factors.
sentences.cn: 血友病就是因为遗传上缺乏一种凝血胶原引起的.

sentences.en: Hemophilia treatment Immune tolerance : a nursing perspective.

sentences.cn: 血友病在1803年初次被描述.

sentences.en: Hemophilia: Hereditary Bleeding disorder caused by deficiency of a coagulation factor.
sentences.cn: 血友病: 一种遗传性出血性疾病,因先天性缺乏某种凝血因子而引起.

sentences.en: Progressions of gene therapy studies for hemophilia B were introduced in this paper.
sentences.cn: 就血友病B的基因治疗研究进展及所存在的问题作一综述.

sentences.en: The safety of intramuscular injection of recombinant adeno - associated virus ( AAV ) - mF to rescue hemophilia B was assessed.
sentences.cn: 研究了肌注腺伴随病毒 ( adeno-associatedvirus,AAV ) 介导凝血因子基因治疗血友病B的安全性.

sentences.en: These disorders may include cystic fibrosis, hemophilia, sickle cell anemia, and many others.
sentences.cn: 这些变异包括包囊纤维症 、 血友病 、 镰状细胞贫血症和其他多种疾病.

sentences.en: We will learn how to manufacture Factor 8, a rare and expensive medicine used to treat hemophilia.
sentences.cn: 我们将能在轨道上试验制作“第八因子”, 这是一种非常珍贵的稀有药物,可以治疗血友病.

trans.tran_en: Haemophilia is a medical condition in which a person's blood does not thicken or clot properly when they are injured, so they continue bleeding
